A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I joined up on here purely to to air my dismay at this total dissapointment. Just such a let down and reading through all the other reviews many have put it far better than I could. \n\nWhat is more concerning though is the obvious fake high scoring reviews on here - some are obviously cut and paste or automated falsifications. This is putting Rotten Tomatoes in a bad light and I'm losing respect for what I originally thought was a genuine movie resource.
